title: The hutment dweller shall pay monthly contribution to his co-operative society @ Rs
clause_text: The hutment dweller shall pay monthly contribution to his co-operative society @ Rs. 500 per month or the amount as decided by his cooperative society whichever is more for common monthly charges against the common electricity and water usage, operation and maintenance of common amenities like lift, generator, S.T.P. plant etc.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The hutment dweller shall pay monthly contribution to his co-operative society @ Rs. 500 per month or the amount as decided by his cooperative society whichever is more for common monthly charges agai
